summary:
**Cloud Infrastructure & Migration**
- Modernized legacy .NET systems to AWS cloud-native architecture, maintaining 99.95% uptime for 2M+ transactions/mo
- Containerized test environments using Docker (8h → 20m provisioning)
- Designed self-healing infrastructure with Ansible automation

**CI/CD Pipeline Architecture**
- Architected enterprise CI/CD framework (TeamCity/Ansible) adopted by 7 teams
- Reduced pipeline setup time from days → hours via reusable templates
- Implemented parallel test execution (60m → 36m runtime)
- Automated 90% of test data management workflows

**Developer Enablement & SRE**
- Built self-service tools reducing developer dependencies by 70%
- Created Grafana/ELK monitoring for 50+ API endpoints
- Developed PowerShell utilities for health checks

**Leadership & Optimization**
- Mentored 5 engineers in infrastructure-as-code practices
- Led AWS migration cutting environment costs by 40%
- Reduced production incidents by 65% post-migration

**Test Automation**
- Built Selenium WebDriver framework with 75% lower maintenance
- Automated 150+ API scenarios with RestSharp/.NET
- Slashed regression time from 2h → 25m

**Process Leadership**
- Managed CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins/AWS)
- Created PowerShell scripts for bug tracking
- Introduced end-to-end testing workflows

**Team Scaling**
- Led 8-10 projects/release with offshore teams
- Improved dev/test collaboration through process changes

**Testing Foundations**
- Reduced iteration windows from 2 weeks → 6-7 days via smoke testing
- Executed 1000+ test cases across functional/mobile/performance
- Bridged communication between engineering and stakeholders
